website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight saltwater reel made of quality materials that last a long time.
pros: Aluminum spool and stainless steel gears
The level wind feature makes it easy to retrieve the line

customer_reviews.title: Real looks great and works the first few times
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real you want to buy. Its will start breaking after your first real fish. I have a penn that is 10 years old that still works as good as when I bought it. This is cheap knockoff product.
customer_reviews.author: michael t.

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money and get any better real
customer_reviews.text: Real handle fell apart never fell off not very good quality started out fine and it up in pieces used it for salt water fishing for a few trips
customer_reviews.author: Mark o

customer_reviews.title: Very excited then disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, seemed like a very quality product out of the box. Very excited to use it on my first fishing trip, first two cast felt great, like a quality real. On the third cast the handle fell off, I lost part #1 and #2 in the jetties. Very disappointed at this point. Luckily I brought two other rod and reels with me. I’m really hoping to be able to buy parts #1 and #2 to salvage this reel. I’ve had no luck contacting anyone about replacement parts. Without these parts the real is useless. Hoping somebody will contact me back.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels great, but does not reel smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I just received it, I love how it look, love how its feels, and that big know handle feels great. But, the bearings or the gears are grinding really hard, I dont know it I want to even put any line on it. Maybe I got a defective one, but will be sending back unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: cesar

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poor quality. Do not waste your money! I bought 2 of these for me and my son and right out of the box they seemed awfully cheap but we decided to give them a chance and took them out for the first time today. Very disappointed. Should have sent them back. Sorry I wasted the line on them. If you want to pay 60 dollars for a 25 dollar real then these are for you, but if you want a good reel pay a little more and get one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Howze

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Hello love the reel cast well and retrieves line fast had one problem handle shaft broke when bringing a shark in but contacted customer service sent pictures of problem they stand by there product going to send replacement parts to repair my reel thanks for the great customer service Richard black
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice look.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking reel for the $$. The handle was loose, twisted it back tight and its good. The handle hand a nasty lil bur on it from machining. A couple passes with file on leatherman and its good to go. It felt nice and smooth, no problem with gears while spooling it up with 350 or so yes of sea blue 50 lb braid. And its looks REALLY cool with the blue on the reel!!! It may not be a $600 Shimano Tiagra, but i never had 1 to know either. I dont see a catfosh or Striper in Alabama it cant handle.
customer_reviews.author: Donald P.

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Got a bad reel and the company was great to make it rite. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: If you buy these check all screws for security prior to use.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality reels! I bought 4 of these reels and was very disappointed when parts fell off and were lost on our very first outing! One of the reels lost the nut retaining screw and the retaining nut for the reel handle. The other reels crank handle came apart and was lost. Thought these were going to be a better value but was apparently wrong. I hope they read this and at the very least send me replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: lots of power holds a lot of line
customer_reviews.text: Awesome reel for the price. Been using it for about a month now throwing big baits from bridges about 3 times a week, Looking for shark tarpon big snook and black drum, Have caught several 100 pound sharks and large 40 inch snook on this reel. Great reel great price I plan on buying a couple more for multiple set ups.
customer_reviews.author: Big fish

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cash
customer_reviews.text: Product looked good and had features I like but the drag was basically worthless no where near as advised. To me if the drag does not work then the real isn't worth the metal in it
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Best shark fishing reel I’ve purchased
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite shark fishing reel. I build my own rods but needed a strong reel to pair with a new boat rod I built. This reel was the answer. Tough and an ease to bring in the big ones. Live it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Long

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials
customer_reviews.text: I am new to saltwater fishing but this reel worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: scoop

customer_reviews.title: ... it up next a penn squall 30 gold tint better, handle better all round much better and for ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away put it up next a penn squall 30 gold tint better , handle better all round much better and for the price way better not as big as I was hoping I would say it's about the size of a penn 25 if the made one I hope this helps u I fish in the Gulf of Mexico rt out of Corpus Christi TX
customer_reviews.author: Michael l brown

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 days ago. He brought it fishing and the handle fell off while he was reeling a fish in. Pretty pathetic. Didn’t last very long. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase
customer_reviews.text: I took this 60 mile off shore and it fell apart took forever to real in a 26in snapper. Do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but..
customer_reviews.text: Great looking reel, but the handle, clicker selector and level winder feel a little shotty, I’ve yet to try and fish with the reel I ended up spending the money on a Penn but I’m sure I’ll get it on a rod and take it offshore and update my review
customer_reviews.author: Davison

customer_reviews.text: I just got this for my boy he totally loved and got a lots of fish 🐠 work’s great very recommend just loved i was looking to buy other in red color for me 😃
customer_reviews.author: Drika

customer_reviews.title: High recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality smooth with beautiful color. I love it ! I’ll recommend it
customer_reviews.author: QQ50454589

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: feels great, haven't used it yet but it feels smooth and amazing, definitely will add a video soon
customer_reviews.author: Martin Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good reel at all caught a couple of nice fish but it don’t stand up to salt water fishing . Cheap , guide out of time , a lot of plastics . I wish I had returned it while my return window was open .
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Jams up
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the product all the bolts get loose and it jams up
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: it casts really smooth. the reel seems to be very sturdy. also quite beautiful. I love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: charles a devine

customer_reviews.title: reel very nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice have not tried it ye but Ib know it will perform
customer_reviews.author: Charles Meehleib

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of line.
customer_reviews.text: The reel holds a lot of braided line. A part on the crank handle fell off into the water. Customer service said they would send me another.
customer_reviews.author: kwd

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: Super reel works great for deep water fishing well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Franz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the weekend end angler
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the money, I have had no problems, well built.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Haley

customer_reviews.title: Need a new one or money back
customer_reviews.text: I when to fishing trip to Montuak long island and handle come of and I noticed that the knot came off my first time of use not good I have to rent one to finish the day
customer_reviews.author: yoni paniagua

customer_reviews.title: Bad line guide
customer_reviews.text: My line guide stopped working after 2 casts. Didnt have time to return so just going to have to eat the cost. Big pain, 2nd one to do this with this brand. Otherwise works fine, but disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Colin Steele

customer_reviews.title: Love my Burning Shark trolling reel
customer_reviews.text: I have used the reel as yet but I love the sturdiness of it its very lightweight and easy for my small hands maneuver. Love it
customer_reviews.author: DEVALIN HENDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a half day trip (1st use) trolled for stripers for about an hour, reeled in and the ball handle fell off in ocean., it unscrews like a soda bottle, bad design. Can only hope rest of reel holds up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m ordering another for my buddy ! He was shocked !
customer_reviews.text: Reel did a great job on my porgy , bluefish mix trip , had no issues at all, handled the job well , at first I ordered this as a backup set , I ended up using it most of the trip , nice reel for the price , gave a bang for its buck !
customer_reviews.author: john Noble

customer_reviews.title: The price is reasonable for the work it can get done.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and compatible with all of my fishing rods. Thanks guys I will definitely buy a next reel for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The ball you crank with came apart
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it the ball on the crank came apart and fell in the ocean. With out that the reel is useless
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bauer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Reel looked nice for the price, bring it out fishing for the 1st time and the reel Stripped out!
customer_reviews.author: Farrell Jeansonne

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great reel for hauling in big fish. The action is very smooth and helps out greatly with the fight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: That it works.. HELLO!!
customer_reviews.text: Opened .. took it out. Level wind won’t work .. goes to one side and stays there till I push it back.. then it stops on the other side. Not a happy camper....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good real
customer_reviews.text: Hello but bigger than I thought it was but massive cranking power
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was using it Sunday on fell into the ocean I just got to real Monday junk
customer_reviews.author: Curtis lawton

product_meta.title: Burning Shark Trolling Reel Saltwater Level Wind Reels, Drag Reels Boat Fishing Ocean Fishing for Sea Bass Grouper Salmon
feature_bullets: HIGH PERFORMANCE:High Quality Trolling Reel,Double Dog Ratchet System Prevents Handle From Reversing.
DETAIED PARTS:Machined Aluminum Spool, Bakelight Sideplates, Stainless Steel Gears for Long-lasting Durability,Smooth Fishing Reel Seat,Spherical Handle.
USING: Noise Is Small,The Line Release Lever Works Good,Comfortable Cranking.Lightweight Corrosion Resistant Frame.
WEIGHT: Approx. 1.3 lb / 600g,Max. Drag: 40 lb,Gear Ratio: 4.1:1.
WARM PROMPT:If You Have Any Problems About Our Products,Please Contack Our Customer Service Team,We Will Solve Your Problems ASAP.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
